info:
John Provencher (b. 1991) is an independent artist, designer, educator, and programmer based in New York City. His practice explores the generative potential of software by outputting projects both on/offline.
x
info-2: John operates independently while collaborating select clients and partners. He frequently publishes online ...
clients: the new york times, nike, prada, alexander wang, the atlantic, bloomberg, the new school, the baffler ...
